sentences.en: The train was on time, but there was no sign of my Finnish friend.
sentences.cn: 火车准时到达了，但还没有见到我芬兰朋友的踪影。

sentences.en: Fad Louhivuod, the school's principal, decided to try something extreme by Finnish standards.
sentences.cn: 学校校长 Fad Louhivuod 决定用芬兰的标准来尝试一些极端的事情。

sentences.en: In 1963, the Finnish Parliament made the bold decision to choose public education as the best means of driving the economy forward and out of recession.
sentences.cn: 在1963年，芬兰议会做出了一个大胆的决定：选择公共教育作为推动经济向前发展和走出经济衰退的最佳手段。
